summary: Makes Nettlebane more lore-worthy by giving it a "Nature's Bane" enchantment that causes extra damage to animals and spriggans.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple lore-improving mod I made for personal use that I am offering to the public.

This mod adds an enchantment to the dagger Nettlebane that inflicts damage to animals and spriggans. Since Nettlebane is likely acquired early in a game, the enchantment is not overly powerful, but it does at least make Nettlebane more interesting.


My other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/42855/?]Lore-Worthy Bandits[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27385/?]Lore-Worthy Hagravens[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30503/?]Lore-Worthy Movarths Boots[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36797/?]Lore-Worthy Quartermasters[/url]
author: Team Value

files.name: LoreWorthyNettlebane
files.changelogHtml: Gave Nettebane the stats of an ebony dagger since that is what its appearance is based on.
